markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 2" pfs="Standard">
[Magic Warrior Aspect](/Spells.aspx?ID=547)
<actions string="Two Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Focus" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=511" />
<trait label="Morph" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=113" />
<trait label="Transmutation" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=157" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 95 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 5 minutes
</row>

</column>

---

You call upon the aspect of the animal from your mask, gaining physical features reminiscent of that animal. You morph slightly into that creature, gaining the Speeds and senses you would gain from using [_animal form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=10) to turn into the type of animal your mask represents; these special Speeds can’t be increased by status bonuses or item bonuses.
name: Magic Warrior Aspect

</row>

---

<summary>
Gain the speed and senses of your totem animal.
</summary>
summary: Gain the speed and senses of your totem animal.
summary_markdown: Gain the speed and senses of your totem animal.
text: Magic Warrior Aspect Two Actions Source World Guide pg. 95 2.0 Cast somatic, verbal Duration 5 minutes --- You call upon the aspect of the animal from your mask, gaining physical features reminiscent of that animal. You morph slightly into that creature, gaining the Speeds and senses you would gain from using animal form to turn into the type of animal your mask represents; these special Speeds can’t be increased by status bonuses or item bonuses.
